titles.title: To provide that requirements relating to transport of certain agricultural commodities and other items shall not apply to certain assistance provided to Russia.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H1942-1943)
Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

bill.summary: 4/22/1993--Introduced. Amends the Merchant Marine Act, 1936 to provide that provisions requiring the use of U.S.-flag commercial vessels for the transport of certain cargoes and agricultural commodities financed by the United States shall not apply to the transport of such items to Russia under the Vancouver Package.
